1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: In this Premiere Episode of DHTV you will learn of early history of Harlem; also about the Farm to Table movement; Meet the owners of Harlem Shake Restaurant and talk with Marcia Sells of Columbia University who is a resident of Harlem.

2.title: Spring Night Out
2.plot: Food and Drink Boulevard: We'll give you a quick highlight of FOOD & DRINK BOULEVARD, an annual summer kickoff event hosted by the Fredrick Douglass Boulevard Alliance. This evening of food and drinks is accompanied by music and entertainment up and down Harlem's Restaurant Row. History of Harlem, Part II: Continue to enjoy while you learn or refresh on Harlem history. This week we'll cover the migration of African Americans north, from Five Point and from the South. DHTV Historian and Tour Guide Lavelle Porter will continue his explanation of some of what has made ...

imdb.plot outline: Destination Harlem TV showcases the wonderful people and places that make Harlem what it is today as well as the history that is shaping its future. Episodes will showcase several aspects of Harlem such as Dining, Nightlife, Interviews, History and Community. Destination Harlem TV appeals to Harlem locals, New Yorker's visiting for a meal or show, tourists on vacation (holiday) and those who are just interested and intrigued by Harlem life. The show or its segments can be easily viewed on a desktop computer, laptop, and mobile devices. Destination Harlem TV is about community - so be a part of it... Friend, Follow and post your comments. Give us your opinions and views and be a part of Destination Harlem TV.
